title: 新约 - 提摩太后书(2 Timothy) - 第 3 章
subTitle: 新约 -- 提摩太后书(2 Timothy) -- 第 3 章 ( 本篇共有 4 章 )

lineList.en: This know also, that in the last days perilous times shall come.
lineList.cn: 你该知道，末世必有危险的日子来到。

lineList.en: For men shall be lovers of their own selves, covetous, boasters, proud, blasphemers, disobedient to parents, unthankful, unholy,
lineList.cn: 因为那时人要专顾自己，贪爱钱财，自夸，狂傲，谤？？，违背父母，忘恩负义，心不圣洁，

lineList.en: Without natural affection, trucebreakers, false accusers, incontinent, fierce, despisers of those that are good,
lineList.cn: 无亲情，不解怨，好说才言，不能自约，性情凶暴，不爱良善，

lineList.en: Traitors, heady, highminded, lovers of pleasures more than lovers of God;
lineList.cn: 卖主卖友，任意妄为，自高自大，爱宴乐不爱神。

lineList.en: Having a form of godliness, but denying the power thereof: from such turn away.
lineList.cn: 有敬虔的外貌，却背了敬虔的实意。这等人你要躲开。

lineList.en: For of this sort are they which creep into houses, and lead captive silly women laden with sins, led away with divers lusts,
lineList.cn: 那偷进人家，牢笼无知妇女的，正是这等人。这些妇女担负罪恶，被各样的私欲引诱。

lineList.en: Ever learning, and never able to come to the knowledge of the truth.
lineList.cn: 常常学习，终久不能明白真道。

lineList.en: Now as Jannes and Jambres withstood Moses, so do these also resist the truth: men of corrupt minds, reprobate concerning the faith.
lineList.cn: 从前雅尼和佯庇怎样敌挡摩西，这等人也怎样敌挡真道。他们的心地坏了，在真道上是可废弃的。

lineList.en: But they shall proceed no further: for their folly shall be manifest unto all men, as theirs also was.
lineList.cn: 然而他们不能再这样敌挡，因为他们的愚昧，必在众人面前显露出来，像那二人一样。

lineList.en: But thou hast fully known my doctrine, manner of life, purpose, faith, longsuffering, charity, patience,
lineList.cn: 但你已经服从了我的教训，品行，志向，信心，宽容，爱心，忍耐，

lineList.en: Persecutions, afflictions, which came unto me at Antioch, at Iconium, at Lystra; what persecutions I endured: but out of them all the Lord delivered me.
lineList.cn: 以及我在安提阿，以哥念，路司得，所遭遇的逼迫，苦难。我所忍受是何等的逼迫。但从这一切苦难中主都把我救出来了。

lineList.en: Yea, and all that will live godly in Christ Jesus shall suffer persecution.
lineList.cn: 不但如此，凡立志在基督耶稣里敬虔度日的，也都要受逼迫。

lineList.en: But evil men and seducers shall wax worse and worse, deceiving, and being deceived.
lineList.cn: 只是作恶的，和迷惑人的，必越久越恶，他欺哄人也被人欺哄。

lineList.en: But continue thou in the things which thou hast learned and hast been assured of, knowing of whom thou hast learned them;
lineList.cn: 但你所学习的，所确信的，要存在心里。因为你知道是跟谁学的。

lineList.en: And that from a child thou hast known the holy scriptures, which are able to make thee wise unto salvation through faith which is in Christ Jesus.
lineList.cn: 并且知道你是从小明白圣经。这圣经能使你因信基督耶稣有得救的智慧。

lineList.en: All scripture is given by inspiration of God, and is profitable for doctrine, for reproof, for correction, for instruction in righteousness:
lineList.cn: 圣经都是神所默示的，（或作凡神默示的圣经）于教训，督责，使人归正，教导人学义，都是有益的。

lineList.en: That the man of God may be perfect, throughly furnished unto all good works.
lineList.cn: 叫属神的人得以完全，豫备行各样的善事。
